fields.name: title
fields.label: Page Title
fields.description: Overrides the page title in browser tab and search results. Leave blank to use the page's main title.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: Short summary shown in search results (recommended: 150–160 characters).

fields.name: ogImage
fields.label: Social Share Image (OG Image)
fields.description: Image shown when sharing on social media. Recommended: 1200×630px.
